content.question: In the fourth paragraph, the author calls Gallaudet University “a symbol of leadership and opportunity” in order to

choices.label: compare Gallaudet favorably to other institutions
suggest that his audience’s values have evolved
appeal to his audience’s pride in the institution

content.answer: appeal to his audience’s pride in the institution

skill.text: Skill 1.B: Explain how an argument demonstrates understanding of an audience's beliefs, values, or needs.
